caption: One day, a woman came to the committee, she was a relative of the tramp. She asked some questions about the body and wondered when they could bury him. However, at this point, to stop the mission was impossible. Ewen told her that the country gave him an important mission and he would become a hero. But the woman didn't believe him. She knew that she couldn't see the body and left the room disappointed. After they put the body on the submarine, one member said that he wanted to stay to express his respect for the dead. Although this was not in the plan, Ewen also agreed.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.
